description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Notable works include 'Across Space And Time', exploring 'ecosystem architecture', and the course 'Groom Your Ecosystem', emphasizing environmental stewardship and leadership.
blurb: Ecosystems are no longer bound by physical or temporal constraints, reflecting a shift towards less hierarchical and more organic human organization, termed 'ecosystem architecture'.
